title: Message To Canadian Leaders: Seize The Day
description:
A message to Premiers Jason Kenney, Scott Moe and Doug Ford, and Leader of Her Majesty's Loyal Opposition Erin O'Toole:

What are you waiting for? This is your moment. Seize the day.

Update: Since this was recorded, Justin Trudeau says he's now tested positive for COVID-19: https://nationalpost.com/news/justin-trudeau-says-hes-now-tested-positive-for-covid-19
